data.text:
Morning, Trainer! Since it was getting kind of old, 
I bought a new flower to replace the one you had there!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Morning, Trainer! Since it was getting kind of old, 
<story>I bought a new flower to replace the one you had there!

data.text:
Over on your desk, that's my dad's promotional good luck 
handkerchief! Feng Shui-wise it's nice, and it's made of good 
materials so it's a present! And―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Over on your desk, that's my dad's promotional good luck 
<story>handkerchief! Feng Shui-wise it's nice, and it's made of good 
<story>materials so it's a present! And―

data.text:
Since the window's closed, let's open it! Ventilation is 
fundamental to Feng Shui! With this, it'll be a fortuitous omen☆ 
Well then, see you at training～!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Since the window's closed, let's open it! Ventilation is 
<story>fundamental to Feng Shui! With this, it'll be a fortuitous omen☆ 
<story>Well then, see you at training～!

data.text:
Thanks to her taking the initiative, the trainers' 
room seemed brighter and because of that work 
seemed to go more smoothly. Although―
data.processed:
<story>Thanks to her taking the initiative, the trainers' 
<story>room seemed brighter and because of that work 
<story>seemed to go more smoothly. Although―

data.text:
Normally, the trainer's role is to support the Uma Musume. I 
started spending the days thinking of ways to repay her―
data.processed:
<story>Normally, the trainer's role is to support the Uma Musume. I 
<story>started spending the days thinking of ways to repay her―

data.text: Then one day
data.processed: <story>Then one day

data.text:
Huh? It's Trainer～! What a coincidence! ……Oh, that's right! Are 
you free right now? There's a place I want to take you!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Huh? It's Trainer～! What a coincidence! ……Oh, that's right! Are 
<story>you free right now? There's a place I want to take you!

data.text:
I didn't particularly have any plans so, 
I followed along with Copano Rickey―
data.processed:
<story>I didn't particularly have any plans so, 
<story>I followed along with Copano Rickey―

data.text:
And so, we're here at the zoo! Ehehe, getting out and getting the 
qi flowing is a great way to increase your luck!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And so, we're here at the zoo! Ehehe, getting out and getting the 
<story>qi flowing is a great way to increase your luck!

data.text:
And the most important part, is heading in a favorable direction! 
This zoo is in a favorable direction for your luck and I've 
always wanted to bring you here. Oh……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And the most important part, is heading in a favorable direction! 
<story>This zoo is in a favorable direction for your luck and I've 
<story>always wanted to bring you here. Oh……

data.text: ……crying? Sorry Trainer, I'm going to go take a look!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>……crying? Sorry Trainer, I'm going to go take a look!

data.text: ―……where is everyone……? Uhuu, uwaaan……!
data.name: Timid Girl
data.processed: <story>―……where is everyone……? Uhuu, uwaaan……!

data.text: Are you okay? What's wrong?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Are you okay? What's wrong?

data.text: Uu……Uuwaaaaan! Everyone's gone……!
data.name: Timid Girl
data.processed: <story>Uu……Uuwaaaaan! Everyone's gone……!

data.text:
I see, so you got separated from your family, huh…… But it seems 
like the area around here isn't very good. It's so damp.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I see, so you got separated from your family, huh…… But it seems 
<story>like the area around here isn't very good. It's so damp.

data.text:
For now, do you wanna come with Big Sis to the lost kids center?! 
I'll take you to a more wonderful place!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>For now, do you wanna come with Big Sis to the lost kids center?! 
<story>I'll take you to a more wonderful place!

data.text: And when Copano Rickey tried to take the girl's hand―
data.processed: <story>And when Copano Rickey tried to take the girl's hand―

data.text: Ah, there she is～!
data.processed: <story>Ah, there she is～!

data.text:
Sorry, I let go of your hand……! Mom and the others are looking 
for you over there, let's go! Um…… thank you very much!
data.name: Girl's Older Sister
data.processed:
<story>Sorry, I let go of your hand……! Mom and the others are looking 
<story>for you over there, let's go! Um…… thank you very much!

data.text:
No, I was just staying here together with her! 
I'm glad you found her, be careful on the way back!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>No, I was just staying here together with her! 
<story>I'm glad you found her, be careful on the way back!

data.text:
Oh, that's right! When heading back, try taking 
that big path in the middle! It's a lucky path 
so you should be able to return safely!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Oh, that's right! When heading back, try taking 
<story>that big path in the middle! It's a lucky path 
<story>so you should be able to return safely!

data.text: ……lucky path? Um…… Miss, are you a weir-…… an occult person?
data.name: Girl's Older Sister
data.processed: <story>……lucky path? Um…… Miss, are you a weir-…… an occult person?

data.text:
I wouldn't say it's occult though…… Hmmm, but well, it's 
sometimes misunderstood, I guess? Why's that?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't say it's occult though…… Hmmm, but well, it's 
<story>sometimes misunderstood, I guess? Why's that?

data.text:
But……at school, they told us that if someone says weird things to 
you, they're trying to take you and that we should be careful―Ah!
data.name: Girl's Older Sister
data.processed:
<story>But……at school, they told us that if someone says weird things to 
<story>you, they're trying to take you and that we should be careful―Ah!

data.text:
N-now that I think about it, miss, 
you said you would 『Take her to a more wonderful place!』……!
data.name: Girl's Older Sister
data.processed:
<story>N-now that I think about it, miss, 
<story>you said you would 『Take her to a more wonderful place!』……!

data.text:
Oh that. In this area, in regards to Feng Shui, 
the qi tends to stagnate. When a place is kind 
of damp, doesn't it kind of lower your spirit?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Oh that. In this area, in regards to Feng Shui, 
<story>the qi tends to stagnate. When a place is kind 
<story>of damp, doesn't it kind of lower your spirit?

data.text:
A corner where many things collide, it's called the cautionary 
boundary of the 8 trigrams, I was just thinking that it would be 
better if this girl was in a luckier place―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>A corner where many things collide, it's called the cautionary 
<story>boundary of the 8 trigrams, I was just thinking that it would be 
<story>better if this girl was in a luckier place―

data.text:
……Collide……trigrams……? I've never heard those words before. 
I-it's true……!! Moooooooooooom～～～!!
data.name: Girl's Older Sister
data.processed:
<story>……Collide……trigrams……? I've never heard those words before. 
<story>I-it's true……!! Moooooooooooom～～～!!

data.text:
I calm the child down, and as we were walking to the lost kids 
center, explain that Copano Rickey is a student at the academy 
and not a strange person.
data.processed:
<story>I calm the child down, and as we were walking to the lost kids 
<story>center, explain that Copano Rickey is a student at the academy 
<story>and not a strange person.

data.text:
I-I-I'm sorry, I'm sorry! For surprising 
you like that, um, um…… I'm sorry～!
data.name: Girl's Older Sister
data.processed:
<story>I-I-I'm sorry, I'm sorry! For surprising 
<story>you like that, um, um…… I'm sorry～!

data.text:
While things ended safely, I wondered if this incident had her 
feeling down. That's what I was thinking but……it seems I was 
slightly off though.
data.processed:
<story>While things ended safely, I wondered if this incident had her 
<story>feeling down. That's what I was thinking but……it seems I was 
<story>slightly off though.

data.text:
Huuu-, I guess I messed up! I was saved thanks 
to Trainer! I guess Feng Shui can seem kind 
of scary from the perspective of a child.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Huuu-, I guess I messed up! I was saved thanks 
<story>to Trainer! I guess Feng Shui can seem kind 
<story>of scary from the perspective of a child.

data.text:
I guess it would have been better to calm down and explain it 
better to that girl. Sometimes I get told 『Rickey, you come on 
too strong』. Yeah, I need to reflect on that!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I guess it would have been better to calm down and explain it 
<story>better to that girl. Sometimes I get told 『Rickey, you come on 
<story>too strong』. Yeah, I need to reflect on that!

data.text:
She was pretty talkative normally. She could reflect on things, 
and quickly handle her own mental care but…… her expression 
seemed kind of distant.
data.processed:
<story>She was pretty talkative normally. She could reflect on things, 
<story>and quickly handle her own mental care but…… her expression 
<story>seemed kind of distant.

data.text:
Eh? Yeah! Of course. I'll try not to make the 
same mistake again, and I'll think of a way to 
phrase it so that it doesn't scare them!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Eh? Yeah! Of course. I'll try not to make the 
<story>same mistake again, and I'll think of a way to 
<story>phrase it so that it doesn't scare them!

data.text:
I knew Copano Rickey was capable of improving the perception of 
Feng Shui. She could make plans, put them in to motion, and 
properly prevent the disruption of qi.
data.processed:
<story>I knew Copano Rickey was capable of improving the perception of 
<story>Feng Shui. She could make plans, put them in to motion, and 
<story>properly prevent the disruption of qi.

data.text:
But that's exactly why, we need to get a handle on any of those 
negative emotions she's feeling. I could sense her 
desperation――and I told her that.
data.processed:
<story>But that's exactly why, we need to get a handle on any of those 
<story>negative emotions she's feeling. I could sense her 
<story>desperation――and I told her that.

data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>……Eh……?

data.text:
…………Ah. I see……that could be. Well……a long time ago, papa told me 
something like that.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>…………Ah. I see……that could be. Well……a long time ago, papa told me 
<story>something like that.

data.text:
You try to 『Solve things with Feng Shui』 too much. Your own 
feelings……especially when you're feeling vulnerable, you tend to 
avoid facing those feelings.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>You try to 『Solve things with Feng Shui』 too much. Your own 
<story>feelings……especially when you're feeling vulnerable, you tend to 
<story>avoid facing those feelings.

data.text:
I tend to fall back on Feng Shui unconsciously, 
so fully suppressing that is not good. I understand 
that but……ahaha, maybe I'm going too far.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I tend to fall back on Feng Shui unconsciously, 
<story>so fully suppressing that is not good. I understand 
<story>that but……ahaha, maybe I'm going too far.

data.text:
Umm, well……what should I do? 
Solving things without using Feng Shui, how do I do that again?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Umm, well……what should I do? 
<story>Solving things without using Feng Shui, how do I do that again?

data.text:
Copano Rickey is at a loss. Perhaps, right now 
what she deseperately needs, is simply to just 
come face to face with those feelings.

choices.text: At that time, how did you feel?

data.processed:
<story>Copano Rickey is at a loss. Perhaps, right now 
<story>what she deseperately needs, is simply to just 
<story>come face to face with those feelings.

data.text:
Eh? How did I feel……? Well, let's see, when that girl let out a 
scream, my chest tightened, and my head went blank……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Eh? How did I feel……? Well, let's see, when that girl let out a 
<story>scream, my chest tightened, and my head went blank……

data.text:
……『Sad』……that might be true! But, being misunderstood 
happens all the time, so it wasn't all that shocking.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>……『Sad』……that might be true! But, being misunderstood 
<story>happens all the time, so it wasn't all that shocking.

data.text: It's just……I wonder if I could have done better……
data.name: Copano Rickey

choices.text: Then, 『I wish I explained it better』?

data.processed: <story>It's just……I wonder if I could have done better……

data.text:
……Yeah, that's it! I usually don't speak out but, so they can 
become lucky, I need to explain properly……!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>……Yeah, that's it! I usually don't speak out but, so they can 
<story>become lucky, I need to explain properly……!

data.text:
…………Yeah, that's what I thought. 
……that's what I was thinking.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>…………Yeah, that's what I thought. 
<story>……that's what I was thinking.

data.text:
Copano Rickey was looking at me, at some point 
her cheerful, soft expression had returned.
data.processed:
<story>Copano Rickey was looking at me, at some point 
<story>her cheerful, soft expression had returned.

data.text:
Yeah, I'm fine now! It feels like a weight has been lifted off my 
shoulders. ……I must have been holding those feelings in.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I'm fine now! It feels like a weight has been lifted off my 
<story>shoulders. ……I must have been holding those feelings in.

data.text: It was helpful. ……Thank you, Trainer!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>It was helpful. ……Thank you, Trainer!
